house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1980 has 5 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 2799 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
